code: import React from'react';import"./Cart.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Cart=function Cart(props){var cart=props.cart;var totalOrdered=cart.reduce(function(previous,current){return previous+current.quantity;},0);var itemsTotal=cart.reduce(function(previous,current){return previous+current.price*current.quantity;},0);var shipping=cart.reduce(function(previous,current){return previous+current.shipping;},0);var tax=(itemsTotal+shipping)*0.15;var orderTotal=itemsTotal+shipping+tax;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Order Summary"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["Items ordered: ",totalOrdered]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Items Total: ",itemsTotal.toFixed(2)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["shipping: ",shipping.toFixed(2)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Tax: $",tax.toFixed(2)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["Order Total: $",orderTotal.toFixed(2)]})]});};export default Cart;
